content:
Future

  • Competition within COM/NET/ORG

  • Registrar/Registry Split

    • Amendment 12 with the Department of Commerce is the driver

      • Key Dates

        • April 26 - test bed open to 5 registrars accredited by ICANN
        • Jun 25 - unlimited registrars accredited by ICANN - postponed until Sep 10
        • Oct 25 - show equal access to all registrars including NSI
      • Shared registry is at www.crsnic.net.
